column2:
"Welcome back. With photon magic, there's
always more to learn, so your journey has barely
just begun."

"Even those who have just started using photon
magic tend to get ahead of themselves,
and assume they know more than they do."

"I want to believe that
won't happen with you,
but please watch yourself."

"ご苦労だった。
法撃は奥が深いから
実際ここからが大変だ。"

"少しばかりテクニックが使えると
誰しも慢心するものだからな。"

"君に限ってそういうことは
ないと信じたいが
くれぐれも気をつけたまえ。"
